sourcesContent:
Top 15 most wanted vacancies:

  • {{vacancy.name}}
    {{vacancy.count}}
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Vacancy } from '../models'; import { VacancyService } from '../vacancy.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-vacancy-top-fiveteen', templateUrl: './vacancy-top-fiveteen.component.html', styleUrls: ['./vacancy-top-fiveteen.component.css'] }) export class VacancyTopFiveteenComponent implements OnInit{ vacancies: Vacancy[] = []; constructor(private service: VacancyService){} ngOnInit(): void{ this.service.getTop15Vacancies().subscribe((vacancies)=>{ this.vacancies = vacancies }) } }
